```{r}
Hitters
```

Base de Treino/Teste - Split inicial

```{r}
hitters_split <- mc_cv(Hitters, prop = 0.8, times = 1)
```

Modelo - algoritmo, modo e motor

```{r}
hitters_model <- decision_tree(min_n = tune()) %>%
  set_mode("regression") %>%
  set_engine("tree")
```

```{r}
hitters_tune <- tune_grid(
  Salary ~ Hits + Years,
  model = hitters_model,
  grid = 10,
  resamples = hitters_split
)
```

```{r}
autoplot(hitters_tune)
```


O melhor modelo

```{r}
hitters_best <- select_best(hitters_tune, metric = "rmse")
```
